mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking_order( booking_id, applicant_id, licence_number, centre_id, slot_time, payment_method, email, phone, status ) VALUES ( #{b.bookingId}, #{b.applicantId}, #{b.licenceNumber}, #{b.centreId}, #{b.slotTime}, #{b.paymentMethod}, #{b.email}, #{b.phone}, #{b.status} )
mapper.select: SELECT booking_id, applicant_id, licence_number, centre_id, DATE_FORMAT(slot_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS slot_time_fmt, payment_method, email, phone, status, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_at_fmt FROM booking_order WHERE booking_id = #{bookingId}
